mapper.insert:
insert into insure_unified_directory (id, hosp_code, hilist_code, hilist_name, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, med_chrgitm_type, chrgitm_lv, lmt_used_flag, list_type, med_use_flag, matn_used_flag, hilist_use_type, lmt_cpnd_type, wubi, pinyin, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.hilistCode}, #{item.hilistName}, #{item.insuAdmdvs}, #{item.begndate}, #{item.enddate}, #{item.medChrgitmType}, #{item.chrgitmLv}, #{item.lmtUsedFlag}, #{item.listType}, #{item.medUseFlag}, #{item.matnUsedFlag}, #{item.hilistUseType}, #{item.lmtCpndType}, #{item.wubi}, #{item.pinyin}, #{item.memo}, #{item.valiFlag}, #{item.rid}, #{item.updtTime}, #{item.crterId}, #{item.crterName}, #{item.crteTime}, #{item.crteOptinsNo}, #{item.opterId}, #{item.opterName}, #{item.optTime}, #{item.optinsNo}, #{item.poolareaNo} )

insert into insure_unified_match (id, hosp_code, med_list_codg, hilist_code, list_type, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.medListCodg}, #{item.hilistCode}, #{item.listType}, #{item.insuAdmdvs}, #{item.begndate}, #{item.enddate}, #{item.memo}, #{item.valiFlag}, #{item.rid}, #{item.updtTime}, #{item.crterId}, #{item.crterName}, #{item.crteTime}, #{item.crteOptinsNo}, #{item.opterId}, #{item.opterName}, #{item.optTime}, #{item.optinsNo}, #{item.poolareaNo} )

insert into insure_unified_limitprice (id, hilist_code, hosp_code, hilist_lmtpric_type, overlmt_dspo_way, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, hilist_pric_uplmt_amt, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, tabname, poolarea_no) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.hilistCode}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.hilistLmtpricType}, #{item.overlmtDspoWay}, #{item.insuAdmdvs}, #{item.begndate}, #{item.enddate}, #{item.hilistPricUplmtAmt}, #{item.valiFlag}, #{item.rid}, #{item.updtTime}, #{item.crterId}, #{item.crterName}, #{item.crteTime}, #{item.crteOptinsNo}, #{item.opterId}, #{item.opterName}, #{item.optTime}, #{item.optinsNo}, #{item.tabname}, #{item.poolareaNo} )

insert into insure_unified_ratio(id, hosp_code, hilist_code, selfpay_prop_psn_type, selfpay_prop_type, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, selfpay_prop, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, tabname, poolarea_no) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.hilistCode}, #{item.selfpayPropPsnType}, #{item.selfpayPropType}, #{item.insuAdmdvs}, #{item.begndate}, #{item.enddate}, #{item.selfpayProp}, #{item.valiFlag}, #{item.rid}, #{item.updtTime}, #{item.crterId}, #{item.crterName}, #{item.crteTime}, #{item.crteOptinsNo}, #{item.opterId}, #{item.opterName}, #{item.optTime}, #{item.optinsNo}, #{item.tabname}, #{item.poolareaNo} )

insert into insure_unified_medicmatch(id, hosp_code, fixmedins_code, medins_list_codg, medins_list_name, med_list_codg, list_type, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, aprvno, dosform, exct_cont, item_cont, prcunt, spec, pacspec, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.fixmedinsCode},#{item.medinsListCodg},#{item.medinsListName},#{item.medListCodg}, #{item.listType},#{item.insuAdmdvs},#{item.begndate}, #{item.enddate}, #{item.aprvno}, #{item.dosform}, #{item.exctCont},#{item.itemCont},#{item.prcunt}, #{item.spec}, #{item.pacspec}, #{item.memo},#{item.valiFlag}, #{item.rid},#{item.updtTime}, #{item.crterId}, #{item.crterName}, #{item.crteTime}, #{item.crteOptinsNo}, #{item.opterId},#{item.opterName}, #{item.optTime},#{item.optinsNo},#{item.poolareaNo} )
mapper.select:
select id, hosp_code, hilist_code, hilist_name, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, med_chrgitm_type, chrgitm_lv, lmt_used_flag, list_type, med_use_flag, matn_used_flag, hilist_use_type, lmt_cpnd_type, wubi, pinyin, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no from insure_unified_directory where hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and ( hilist_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hosp_code, med_list_codg, hilist_code, list_type, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no from insure_unified_match where hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and ( med_list_codg like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hilist_code, hosp_code, hilist_lmtpric_type, overlmt_dspo_way, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, hilist_pric_uplmt_amt, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, tabname, poolarea_no from insure_unified_limitprice where hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hilist_code, hosp_code, hilist_lmtpric_type, overlmt_dspo_way, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, hilist_pric_uplmt_amt, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, tabname, poolarea_no from insure_unified_limitprice where hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hosp_code, med_list_codg, hilist_code, list_type, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no from insure_unified_match where hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ( med_list_codg like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hosp_code, hilist_code, hilist_name, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, med_chrgitm_type, chrgitm_lv, lmt_used_flag, list_type, med_use_flag, matn_used_flag, hilist_use_type, lmt_cpnd_type, wubi, pinyin, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no from insure_unified_directory where hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or hilist_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hosp_code, hilist_code, selfpay_prop_psn_type, selfpay_prop_type, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, selfpay_prop, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, tabname, poolarea_no from insure_unified_ratio where hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hosp_code, hilist_code, selfpay_prop_psn_type, selfpay_prop_type, insu_admdvs, begndate, enddate, selfpay_prop, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, tabname, poolarea_no from insure_unified_ratio where hosp_code =#{hospCode}
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hosp_code, fixmedins_code, medins_list_codg, medins_list_name, med_list_codg, list_type, insu_admdvs , begndate, enddate, aprvno, dosform, exct_cont, item_cont, prcunt, spec, pacspec, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no from insure_unified_medicmatch
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hosp_code, fixmedins_code, medins_list_codg, medins_list_name, med_list_codg, list_type, insu_admdvs , begndate, enddate, aprvno, dosform, exct_cont, item_cont, prcunt, spec, pacspec, memo, vali_flag, rid, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_time, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, poolarea_no from insure_unified_medicmatch
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select id, hosp_code, med_list_codg, drug_prodname, genname_codg, drug_genname, ethdrug_type, chemname, alis, eng_name, dosform, each_dos, used_frqu, nat_drug_no, used_mtd, ing, chrt, defs, tabo, mnan, stog, drug_spec, prcunt_type, otc_flag, pacmatl, pacspec, min_useunt, min_salunt, manl, rute, begndate, enddate, pham_type, memo, pac_cnt, min_unt, min_pac_cnt, min_pacunt, min_prepunt, drug_expy, efcc_atd, min_prcunt, wubi, pinyin, vali_flag, rid, crte_time, updt_time, crter_id, crter_name, crte_optins_no, opter_id, opter_name, opt_time, optins_no, ver from insure_unified_nation_drug
and ( hilist_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
